Html:
Hello,
I have a problem, i have written am App in C# to play Multiple Audio Files at the same Time (triggert via Midi), i creates a PLayer Class which handels the UI and the Audio File Reader, when i press play the player throws an event to the Main form where the SampleProvider from the LPayer gets added to a SampleMixingProvider. When I test this with a signal Generator everything works, but when i use an AudioFileReader my app freezes.

I defined a Output Format in my Main Form which i pass to my player instances so that they can convert the AudioStream from the audioFilereder to the output Format.

I dont know why my App freezes when i try to load an AudioFile because no error is thrown, can you guys tell me where i can take a look to fix this?

I hope it was clear, here a picture of my signal chain:


The green Boxes are located in my Player Class the White Boxes are located at my Main Form

many thanks for this great audio Framework and sorry for my bad english
ok it now works, i think the error was that i put the audioFileReader to an Wavestreamobject, now i handle the audioFileReader as an SampleProvider and it works
Great, glad you found the solution and sorry it has taken me so long to get round to responding. Nice signal chain diagram - it's a good way of visualising what's going on with your application
